fullplot: A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.
plot: A financial executive who can't stop his career downspiral is invited into his daughter's imaginary world, where solutions to his problems await.
title: Imagine That

tomatoes.consensus: Despite a promising turn by newcomer Yara Shahidi, Imagine That is another pedestrian family comedy that squanders Eddie Murphy's comedic talents.
